LanguageData.Ship_Beam.label: Viga estrutural de nave
LanguageData.Ship_Beam.description: Una viga estructural alrededor de la cual se puede contruir una nave espacial.
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Blueprint.label: ship structural beam (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Frame.label: ship structural beam (building)
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Frame.description: A structural beam around which a ship can be constructed.
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket.label: Sarcófago de criptosueño de nave
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket.description: Un sarcófago de criptosueño reforzado contra los peligros del espacio. Capaz de mantener a una persona en estado de estasis durante siglos y capaz de sobrevivir una reentrada atmosférica.
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket_Blueprint.label: ship cryptosleep casket (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket_Frame.label: ship cryptosleep casket (building)
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket_Frame.description: A cryptosleep casket hardened against the dangers of space. Capable of maintaining a person in cryptosleep for centuries in a space environment and surviving atmospheric re-entry.
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore.label: Ordenador central de nave
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore.description: El núcleo de un ordenador capaz de albergar una IA de inteligencia sobrehumana que podrá guiar a la nave por el espacio a pesar de cualquier dificultad.
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore_Blueprint.label: ship computer core (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore_Frame.label: ship computer core (building)
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore_Frame.description: A computer core capable of housing a superhumanlike AI who can guide a ship through any challenge.
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor.label: Reactor de nave
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor.description: Produce energía para la nave durante su viaje a traves del espacio.
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor_Blueprint.label: ship reactor (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor_Frame.label: ship reactor (building)
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor_Frame.description: Powers a ship on its journey through space.
LanguageData.Ship_Engine.label: Motor de nave
LanguageData.Ship_Engine.description: Un motor de nave propulsado por antimateria. Capaz de poner a una nave en órbita y en trayectorias insterestelares.
LanguageData.Ship_Engine_Blueprint.label: ship engine (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_Engine_Frame.label: ship engine (building)
LanguageData.Ship_Engine_Frame.description: An engine capable of launching a ship into orbit and on interstellar trajectories.
LanguageData.Ship_SensorCluster.label: sensor cluster
LanguageData.Ship_SensorCluster.description: A sensor module, searching the void for dangers and opportunities.
LanguageData.Ship_SensorCluster_Blueprint.label: sensor cluster (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_SensorCluster_Frame.label: sensor cluster (building)
LanguageData.Ship_SensorCluster_Frame.description: A sensor module, searching the void for dangers and opportunities.
